data.event: The population of Phalia was calculated to be 25,914 in 2007 (21,025 in 1998).
Alexander the Great and his army crossed the Jhelum in July 326 BC at the Battle of the Hydaspes River where he defeated the Indian king Porus.

event.title: 326 BC at the Battle of the Hydaspes River where he defeated

data.event: Alexander the Great and his army crossed the Jhelum in July 326 BC at the Battle of the Hydaspes River where he defeated the Indian king Porus.

The Alexander while forwarding from Taxila opted alternate way despite of using traditional route i.e. today's GT road and built two cities on opposite banks of the river Hydaspes en route between Bhera and Mong.

event.title: established by his father, Sultan Sebuktegin, In 1005

data.event: In 997 CE, Sultan Mahmud Ghaznavi, took over the Ghaznavid dynasty empire established by his father, Sultan Sebuktegin, In 1005 he conquered the Shahis in Kabul in 1005, and followed it by the conquests of Punjab region.

event.title: conquered the Shahis in Kabul in 1005

data.event: In 997 CE, Sultan Mahmud Ghaznavi, took over the Ghaznavid dynasty empire established by his father, Sultan Sebuktegin, In 1005 he conquered the Shahis in Kabul in 1005, and followed it by the conquests of Punjab region.
In 2010, maximum of the area reshaped into commercial land and precious heritage could not be preserved.
